price: 39. Maar (Farao) keerde zich af tezamen met zijn legers, en zei: “Een tovenaar of een dwaas.”
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
